(117)  bharakara thanathure pethsama wibhagaya 24da (117)  fonsekage pathkirima gasat karayi (117)  pilleyan yali rimand (117)  miduma nisa maththala giya yana katunayakata (117)  swadhina rajyayak pihituwima wenuwen sannaddhawa satan kala pudgalayin eyata samana wisandumak balaporoththu wanu atha (117)  mundalame dumriya anathura (117)  rajya sewakayinta jangama durakathana thahanamak ! (116)  manik wyaparikayekuge laksha 61k rajasanthakayi ! (116)  pluto wenuwata aluth grahayek ! (116)  wagawime awashyathawaya shri lanka rajayata atha! (116)  muhunata muhuna gati siduwannata giya, dumriya anathurak 99n walake ! (116)  migamuwa - kolambaa margaya wase (116)  manawa himikam komasaris ada uthurata !
